name: Archaic Petra
title: Of Mountains Mighty: Archaic Petra
desc: "While the Millelith stands guard, evil shall never prevail!"
inPlayDescription: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less <span style="color:#FFE699FF">Geo Die. (Once per Round)<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be <span style="color:#FFE699FF">Geo.
